mapper.select: select MOVIE_ID as movieId, MOVIE_KOR_TITLE as movieKorTitle, MOVIE_ENG_TITLE as movieEngTitle, RELEASE_DT as releaseDt, DISPLAY_YN as displayYn, END_YN as endYn, CRE_DT as creDt, CRE_ID as creId, UPD_DT as updDt, UPD_ID as updId from MOVIE_MASTER
mapper.insert: insert into MOVIE_MASTER( MOVIE_KOR_TITLE, MOVIE_ENG_TITLE, RELEASE_DT, END_YN, DISPLAY_YN, CRE_ID, CRE_DT, UPD_ID ) VALUES ( #{movieKorTitle}, #{movieEngTitle}, #{releaseDate}, #{endYn}, #{displayYn}, #{creId}, NOW(), #{updId} );
mapper.select: SELECT mm.MOVIE_ID as movieId, mm.MOVIE_KOR_TITLE as movieKorTitle, mi.FILE_NM as FileNm FROM MOVIE_MASTER mm LEFT OUTER JOIN MOVIE_IMAGE mi ON mm.MOVIE_ID = mi.MOVIE_ID AND mi.DELEGATE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY mm.CRE_DT DESC;
